inn1.comm: blocked away in to the covers
defended to mid-off
played towards the covers off the front foot
thick edge takes the ball away down to third man
comes down the track to turn the ball to midwicket
short and wider ball which Ryder flashes at with the cover drive only to get  a thick edge again to third man for another single
pitched short and defended off the hips to square leg
short again and prodded away to cover
short of a length again and this time too straight. Ryder hops up lifting up his front knee and timely whips the ball high over square leg and in to the stand. Six runs
too wide a swinging away. Ryder leaves it alone
blocked away in to extra cover
defended to cover. Ryder seems content with the one boundary for the over

McCullum shuffles down the track as usual and Edwards has pitched the ball up. He tries a defensive push only to catch the outside edge and the keeper Ramdin makes a good diving catch away towards first slip. Excellent start for West Indies
blocked to midwicket off the back foot and there is enough of a gap to take a single to get off the mark
wide and swinging away from the batsmen
fuller ball outside off-stump and Ryder miss times this drive for another thick edge to third man
flicked off his legs through square leg and he finds the gap between the fielders to turn and take a second
wide and swinging out from the right handed batsmen
well-timed cut shot off the back foot but an excellent stop in the field by the man at point
blocked away to cover
going down leg-side and hits of the pad running away to fine leg
another cut shot but straight to extra cover
outstanding! Ryder plays the back-foot cut shot that echoes throughout the ground and splits the fielders and reaches the boundary in a flash. Quality shot
too far down leg-stump this time and they take a single leg bye
blocked away to point
bouncer ball and Ryder has a look but leans his back out the way of the shot
not timing as Ryder thrashes at the fuller ball outside off-stump
dropped in to midwicket but the fielder's quickly on to it
driven in to the covers
jabbed to short cover
pitched up and moving in towards off-stump but evaded from the batsmen
a similar delivery and How quite happy to leave
fuller ball flicked off the toes down to third man
slower full toss which takes Ryder by surprise and he defends to midwicket
well bowled! Short of a length and nips away a touch but enough to square up the batsmen
slower ball outside off-stump left alone
well timed drive but straight to short cover who gets down well to stop but that one is going to sting a lot
driven away again, not so well timed and picked up at short cover again
bit of a wild swipe and a thick bottom edge runs away to mid-on
amazing! Pitched up again and Ryder gets right underneath it and it goes high up in the air over the keepers head and somehow carries all the way for six at long leg.
blocked straight back to the bowler
fuller ball dug out back to the bowler
fended off in to the covers
pitched up and a swing and a miss
short ball but slower and catches out How who has to adjust quick to block off the front foot
cut away to backward point and they take a quick single
pulled through midwicket but picked up on the boundary
defended away in to the off-side
cut away the wide one but fielded just in front of point
slower yorker and Ryder's equal to it blocking in to the vacant midwicket
How shuffles across his stumps and deflects the ball fine down the leg-side and it runs all the way for four
chipped off his toes to square leg
dropped in to midwicket and they hurry one
pulled through the leg-side and lifted on the boundary
too far down leg-side
shorter length and blocked off the back foot
too short and How pivots well pounding the ball through midwicket all the way to the rope
straight drive beats the diving Pollard but mid-on comes round to cover
down the leg-side again
leg-stump half volley and Ryder times the shot with ease lifting the ball over deep midwicket and all the way for six!
cover drive but well stopped in the field
slower ball which Ryder fails to pick up on and miss times the stroke
played on to his pads and away to short cover
defended away to mid-on and he's far enough back for them to take one
tapped to square leg and a single in the gap
cover drive which is half-stopped in the field
too straight and flicked away to fine leg
turned away through square leg
driven away to long-off
pushed away off the back foot to long-off
blocked in to short cover
cut away through backward point
cut off the back foot through cover and fielded on the boundary

pitched wide of off-stump and Ryder tries to lift the ball in to the leg-side. He doesn't catch all of it and Chattergoon is waiting at deep cover who takes a good catch moving forwards inside the rope
blocked to midwicket
slower ball and he plays the shot far too early and the ball pops up in the air but just to the right of Taylor. Well bowled
straight drive but Taylor gets down to stop
drives to mid-on
defended back to the bowler
driven underneath a diving cover but a man in the deep returns the ball
defended straight
manipulated through square leg
cut away and picked up at deep point
turned round to short leg and they steal a quick single. Run-out appeal turned down by the video replay
played through midwicket
down the leg-side
blocked in to short cover
cut away in the air and falls just short of extra cover
driven wide of cover and they take a single
goes for the big shot but a thick edge in to his pads before stealing a single to short leg
tried to play across his stumps through the leg-side but Jamie How is undone by a full toss from Taylor which strikes middle and off.
angled away down to third man
driven to cover where a miss field gifts them a single
straight drive to the bowler
turned towards mid-on
cut away to cover
a flick of the wrist to guide the ball through square leg and good running for the second
chipped in to midwicket
turned away to fine leg
straight drive to long-off
fuller and wider delivery and Flynn plays the drive shot too late and he gets a thin edge which carries through to the keeper. Good timely wicket for West Indies
blocked away to cover
defended away to point
full toss finds a thick edge and runs all the way down to third man
slower and fuller again which drops just short of the man at cover
too far down the leg-side
played away through square leg
bouncer ball and he leans out the way
angled away to third man
played through midwicket
another short ball and he leans out the way
pitched up and cut away in the air in front of point
cut away again to deep point
flighted up and a touch slower Taylor slices right underneath it and he knows as soon as he hits the ball he's in trouble. The ball soars high and straight in to the hands of the fielder at mid-off
blocked in to the covers
flicked through square leg
sweep shot angled away to short leg
leaned away to short third man and quick running for a single
driven to the man at short cover
cut away and a great stop at point but the ball squirts away and they take a single
angled away off the back foot down to third man
slower ball catches a thin edge but doesn't carry through to the keeper
dug away off his toes to cover
short of a length and sheer pace beats the bat outside off-stump
scuffed in to the ground but Oram calls the single and makes good ground to steal a single
pushed away through point
reverse sweep doesn't connect and the ball harmlessly drops off the pads
placed to mid-on and more quick running for another single
drive straight to short cover
driven back to the bowler
cut away to deep cover
chipped down right of Gayle who picks up quick and goes for the run out but to no avail
going down the leg-side
well-timed and the ball is hit high and back over Gayle's head and just carries over the rope for six
goes for it again but this time results in a high slice over cover point and bounces just inside the rope this time
fuller ball which Oram just takes on the full turning the ball away through fine leg
driven in to the covers
flicked through square leg
bowled down the leg-side and Oram leans back and tries to go for the big shot through midwicket. He catches the top-edge and Edwards makes a great diving catch running in from deep square leg
blocked to backward point

captain Vettori tries to angle the ball away to the third man area but it's too straight for that sort of shot and he plays the ball on to his own stumps. Not the first captain to go out first ball today...
driven to mid-off
great timing there for the cut shot through backward point and that's four all the way
chip and run straight to extra cover
fended off away to deep cover
flicked off his legs to short leg
pitched up in the air and pulled through the leg-side but lands short of the man at deep point
straight drive to long-on
played away to long-off
chipped in to the gap at short midwicket and they manage to come back for a second
fuller ball dug away to long-on
sliding away down leg-side
bottom edge runs away to the leg-side and they scamper through one
straight drive beats the bowler but mid-off comes round to pick it up
fuller ball dug out to cover
clatters off the pads and confusion over whether they should run or not and they end up turning back as Edwards tries to run out Mills
straight shot to long-off
jabbed in to short cover
Mills has to go for it but he picks out Miller at long-on who takes a simple catch as there's not enough on it to reach the boundary
straight drive deflected away by Gayle
flicked through square leg and good running as they come back for two
hacked away through midwicket
good fuller length and he can only prod it back to Gayle
cut away straight to the man at deep point
pulled through midwicket but fielded on the boundary once more
shorter ball but he takes all the pace off it and Elliot misses
perfect length for the batsmen who middles the shot and it soars high over cover and in to the crowd
driven to cover
goes for the full toss and Southee takes a wild slash which catches a thin edge and races away for four fine of third man

inn2.comm: great line outside off-stump which nips in a bit
and again but Gayle leaves this time
swinging in towards the batsmen and a thick edge runs away towards mid-off
pitched up and swinging away from the batsmen
fuller delivery outside off-stump left alone
cut down in to the ground towards gully
short and straight from Southee and Gayle lifts it over midwicket and landing just short of the rope for a one-bounce four
turned through midwicket
hacked away a bottom edge to midwicket
blocked away to point
defended in to the ground but Gayle is alert and wants the quick single
slower ball and a bottom edge just misses the stumps and beats McCullum running away to fine leg
angled off towards gully
straight drive picked up by mid-off
another slower ball blocked in to the covers
too much width and a smashing cut shot through point which runs away to the boundary
slower ball again and angled away to backward point
leans it away down to third man
off the pads to short leg
going down leg-side again and hits the pads
off the bat away to backward point
well bowled! Swinging in and Chattergoon goes for a big drive and catches an inside edge playing the ball on to his stumps
blocked away towards extra cover
angled off to gully
straight drive lifted at mid-off
drive shot fielded at cover
jabbed away to point off the back foot
driven to mid-off
blocked in to short midwicket
cut away to backward point
driven to cover and they sprint a single
blocked down off the back foot
slower ball which Gayle picks up and clubs away but it falls short of Taylor at mid-off who then demolishes the stumps at the non-strikers end with a direct hit but Sarwan was miles in
flicked away off his legs and well-timed enough to reach the boundary down at fine leg
blocked away to point
slower ball but Gayle picks it up and lifts the ball high over midwicket bouncing just short of the rope for four
driven to long-off
angled away to point
defended away to gully
angles the bat and uses the pace to guide the ball to third man
slower ball batted away to long-off
played away to long-on
pulled away and picked up at deep square leg
played straight to long-off
turned off his hips through square leg
turning away from off-stump and left alone
takes the single again down to long-off
fuller ball whipped off his toes through square leg
blocked away to point off the back foot
miss timed cut shot in to the ground
tries to cut again and gets the outside edge and the ball loops away but falls well short of third man
blocked to midwicket
hacked to midwicket and they hurry through for a single
cut away through the gap at point
pulled through midwicket and picked up in the deep
driven away to long-on
played straight again to long-on
cut away and fielded at deep cover
finds the gap again through the covers and picked up on the rope
clubbed down to long-on
fuller ball on leg-stump and Gayle flicks it away behind square leg and it trundles away for four
blocked off to gully
prodded away towards long-off
too wide and he plays it late, slicing the ball through backward point for four
blocked to ball in to short cover and they steal a single before a fielder can pounce on it
too wide and Sarwan just about reaches to cut the ball away to deep cover
Gayle leans back and puts all his strength in to the shot and smashes the ball flat over midwicket for six
spinning away off the pads and a half-shout but too high

great ball! Vettori bowls a lot tighter and a touch quicker and Gayle plays the shot too late as the ball squeezes under hit bat and touches the top of off-stump. Such an important wicket. We all know the damage he is capable of
blocked off the back foot
defended back to the bowler
late cut down to third man
driven to mid-off
jabbed away to short cover
inside edge down on to his foot and that could have gone anywhere but it squirted out past his right foot
dropped in to short cover and they take off for a quick single. Ross Taylor pounces on the ball but cannot return it quickly enough
cut away to deep point
inside edge off his pads to square leg
driven to mid-on
blocked in to short midwicket
front foot defensive shot back to the bowler
flicked in to the leg-side for another hurried single
cut away to backward point
fuller ball dug out straight back to Oram
driven away to mid-on
bowled 'im! Oram rolls his fingers around the slower ball which moves in a touch and hits the top of Marshall's off-stump
eased away nicely down to third man
leans it away down to third man
driven to short cover
hits of the pads and a big lbw shout from Vettori but going down the leg-side
cut away through backward point
prodded away to gully
blocked to short cover
defended in to the covers once more
blocked in to the ground by Nash who is quite happy to take his time to play himself in
leans it away to backward point and they casually jog a single
blocked away to point
prodded away in to the off-side
driven straight back to Oram
slower full toss chipped away to long-off
too short and straight and Sarwan times the pull shot well enough to reach the square leg boundary
flicked to short midwicket
flicked through square leg and they look for a second but it's not on
blocked to mid-off
turned through midwicket and they sprint one
finds the gap at square leg once more
spins away off the pads and a big shout but bat first
guided away through point
blocked to short midwicket
pulled through midwicket but there's a man in the deep to pick it up
thick inside edge that somehow finds its way to square leg
full toss played straight to long-on
jabbed away to midwicket
blocked to short midwicket
driven away off the back foot to long-off
comes down the track to lift the ball but it drops short of long-on
full toss to long-off and another single
played to Vettori's left and they sneak a single
off the pads but hit outside the line of off-stump whilst playing a shot
hit down towards long-off
rank full toss and Nash delivers the full treatment tanking the ball out the middle of the bat high over midwicket. It's still rising as it reaches the boundary and that's six anywhere
prodded away in to the covers
tries to go for the big shot again but Patel pitches the ball well and hits the stumps as Nash takes a vain swipe trying to play through the leg-side
flicked through square leg
cut away towards deep point
cut away and well timed enough to take a second
hacked away through midwicket
flicks it through square leg
Sarwan rocks on to his back foot and places a well-timed cut shot through the covers which races away to the boundary
goes for the cut again but straight to the fielder at extra cover
played down to the man at long-off
clips of the top of his pads and runs down to short leg
full toss clubbed away to long-on. Flynn gets on it quickly and Marshall slips turning at the non-strikers end

slower ball and Pollard makes good contact but doesn't take all of it and it's a long boundary over a midwicket. Taylor seems to loose it in the floodlights momentarily but he picks it up to take the catch with safe hands
slower ball outside off-stump and Sarwan takes a swing and a miss
slower ball again pitched up and prodded away to the covers
turned away through midwicket
cut away past backward point
chipped down towards long-on
flicked through midwicket
going for the big shot and he slices it away to the deep but Sarwan slips again turning to come back for his second
prodded away to the gap on the leg-side and New Zealand happy to give them singles
driven straight to the man at cover
cut away through backward point
slower delivery completely bamboozles the batsmen who takes a vain swipe
angled away to short third man
hit in the air past the diving Taylor at midwicket and picked up at long-on
fuller ball dug out to short leg and they sprint through one
hit on the half-volley straight back over the bowlers head and there's enough on it to go all the way for six.
cut away through point and they turn quick for two
chipped away to long-off
miss times the big shot which fall short of long-off and they pick up a single
superb improvisation! Ramdin shuffles across his stumps and flicks the ball on the half volley past the fielder diving at short fine leg.
goes hard at the flashing cut and edges it over the infield and it races away to the boundary where Flynn makes a good diving stop but they pick up three
prodded away towards point and another one added to the total
full toss and he comes down the track to place the ball past cover and they manage to turn without slipping and pick up two runs
another ugly full toss from Patel about waist high. He goes for the pull shot which drops agonisingly short of Taylor at deep midwicket but he stops the boundary
jabbed away to the covers and they scramble one
another full toss from Patel and Ramdin connects pulling the ball through midwicket. Four runs

leans back and takes another swipe and he connects again! The ball sails high over extra cover and takes a couple of hops before jumping over the rope. Back to back boundaries and West Indies in the driving seat
cut away to gully and they take one to keep Ramdin on strike
short of a length and it gets pulled over midwicket and they take two. Picked up in the deep
slower ball which is clubbed away but only to short midwicket. No run
he tries to cut away the wide one and gets a bottom edge through to McCullum. He rolls the ball at the stumps and misses as Ramdin retreats back to his crease. He would have been out! No run
cut away to backward point and they scamper the single. Elliot throws at the stumps and just misses. They take one and the scores are level
slower ball cut away and it finds a gap in between the field. Both batsmen punch the air in delight as they sprint through for the winning runs.
